description: This file sets up a knowledge base with sample CV data, initializes a vector database, creates an agent and a team, and performs a query about a specific user.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class for handling PDF documents.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Agent class for handling interactions and queries.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Class representing a team of agents and members.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads or reloads the knowledge base, with option to recreate.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a given prompt.
